Dry hands.sentence: The healthcare worker turns on the hand dryer.
Dry hands.subject: The healthcare worker

Dry hands.sentence: The healthcare worker positions their hands under the air nozzle.
Dry hands.subject: The healthcare worker

Dry hands.sentence: The healthcare worker moves their hands around to ensure even drying.
Dry hands.subject: The healthcare worker

Dry hands.sentence: The healthcare worker removes their hands after the drying cycle is complete.

Dry hands.sentence: The healthcare worker checks their hands for any remaining moisture.
Dry hands.subject: The healthcare worker
